title: Kaos Theory 1 - 4 ... oldskool
description:
128 mp3

Kaos Theory was a short series of compilation albums by Telstar Records which were compiled from "hardcore rave" records that were not on general release to the public. Many of these artists would later become known for their drum and bass material.

The four volumes were released in quick succession during the "hardcore" rave period during the early 1990s in the United Kingdom.

13 Jellywobble (Blob A Lob A Mix) - Noise Engineer
14 The Bouncer - Kicks Like a Mule
15 Asi Mi Gusta A Mi - Chimo Bayo
16 Different Story (Different Mix) - Bowa

I at one point had KT3 which was given to me by DJ Dan at a record store in Irvine California, I just happened to be shopping at the same store he was at the same time... we discussed various music of the scene and he gave me KT3 and said it was some good stuff... I lost the disc and went searching for a replacement for it... not able to find a "Cheap" copy I turned to PirateBay but ended up searching far and wide to get all 4 of these disc I was only able to download KT2 the other 3 I was forced to buy, and Today I just received KT4 in the mail and was able to provide a complete collection of Kaos Theory 1-4

Hope you enjoy a candy trip and strawberry flip back to the better days of raves, before they became just another concert... the days of map points and dark warehouses... glow sticks, moving, grooving, dancing, sweating till the wee hours of the night...
